alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bayfield, southwestern Iron, Washburn, Ashland, northwestern Price, southeastern Burnett and Sawyer Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Benoit, to Cable, to near Webster, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cable and Seeley around 535 PM CDT. Namekagon Lake around 540 PM CDT. Namekagon around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mellen, Clam Lake, Shell Lake, Glidden and Birchwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn
